channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report E-2025030409
item.description:
Report E-2025030409

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-15T00:53:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-23
  • City: ROCKY MOUNT
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLI TRANSPORT, LP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Our driver was dropping NA1993 ULSD into our underground storage tank. The tank 90% flapper lid closed and stopped the flow of product. Our driver thought the rest of the product in the drop hose could fit, so the driver unlatched the drop fitting to let air in and the product to continue flowing into the tank. The flapper lid remained closed and the product spilled approximately 15 gallons onto our parking lot. Our driver used our trailer spill kit along with the store spill kit to contain the spill and clean up the area. No product reached any drains or soil. The product was disposed of into our hazardous waste bins.
